statements: UPDATE peer_to_peer_lending_platform SET interest_rate=3.5 WHERE user_id=123;
UPDATE peer_to_peer_lending_platform SET loan_amount=5000.00, status='approved' WHERE username='JohnDoe';
UPDATE peer_to_peer_lending_platform SET loan_duration=10, status='rejected' WHERE email='jane@example.com';
UPDATE peer_to_peer_lending_platform SET loan_amount = 1500, interest_rate = 8.5, status = 'approved' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE peer_to_peer_lending_platform SET interest_rate = 6.75, loan_duration = 12, status = 'approved' WHERE username = 'alice';
UPDATE peer_to_peer_lending_platform SET email = 'newemail@example.com', status = 'rejected' WHERE user_id = 102;
UPDATE borrowers SET borrowed_amount = borrowed_amount + 100 WHERE borrower_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE lenders SET available_funds = available_funds - 50 WHERE lender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001';
UPDATE borrowers SET borrowed_amount = borrowed_amount - 200 WHERE borrower_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440002';
UPDATE borrowers SET borrowed_amount = borrowed_amount + 1000 WHERE borrower_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE lenders SET available_funds = available_funds - 500 WHERE lender_name = 'Bob';
UPDATE borrowers b SET borrowed_amount = borrowed_amount + 500 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM lenders l WHERE l.available_funds >= 500 AND b.borrowed_amount + 500 <= l.available_funds);
UPDATE peer_to_peer_lending_users SET username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE peer_to_peer_lending_loans SET loan_amount = 1500.00 WHERE loan_id = 3;
UPDATE peer_to_peer_lending_transactions SET transaction_amount = 2000.00 WHERE transaction_id = 5;

UPDATE peer_to_peer_lending_loans SET loan_amount = 1500.00, loan_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE loan_id = 101;
UPDATE peer_to_peer_lending_transactions SET transaction_amount = 500.00, transaction_date = '2023-01-10' WHERE transaction_id = 201;
UPDATE users SET username = 'john_doe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE loans SET status = 'approved' WHERE loan_id = 101;
UPDATE wallets SET balance = balance + 1000.00 WHERE user_id = 10;
